DataShape.description: This datashape is used by the PTC.SCA.SCO.ManageResourceUtils.SetAdditionalPropertiesMashupController service to define all the widgets that should be controlled in the Additional Properties.
DataShape.name: PTC.Factory.ManufacturingElementPropertyDetailsDatashape

FieldDefinition.description: this use used to control the visibility of the add button.
FieldDefinition.name: btnAdd_Visible

FieldDefinition.description: this use used to control the visibility of the edit button.
FieldDefinition.name: btnEdit_Visible

FieldDefinition.description: this use used to control the visibility of the remove button.
FieldDefinition.name: btnRemove_Visible

FieldDefinition.description: this use used to control the visibility of the static property drop down.
FieldDefinition.name: dropdownStaticPropertyType_Visible

FieldDefinition.description: Boolean input to know if you should enable preserve selection. This controller should prevent the preserve selection on EDIT state.
FieldDefinition.name: isEquipmentSelectionPreserved

FieldDefinition.description: this will make the radio property look like it is disable or enable.
FieldDefinition.name: radioProperty_Visible

FieldDefinition.description: this should toggle the contained mashup to see single or multi tag selection.
FieldDefinition.name: setToSingleSelect

FieldDefinition.description: This boolean is used to disable the preserve selection in the session variable
FieldDefinition.name: shouldDisablePreserveSelection

FieldDefinition.description: this use used to disable the property text box.
FieldDefinition.name: txtStaticPropertyTypeDisable_Visible
